text: James E. O'Grady (born 1929) is an American law enforcement official and politician. He was the Superintendent of the Chicago Police Department from 1978 to 1979 and in 1983. O'Grady was Sheriff of Cook County, Illinois from 1986 to 1990. O'Grady was born in Chicago. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American police officers
title: James E. O'Grady
